WRITING.TITLE: How Hillary Clinton can be a bigot
WRITING.TEXT:
I am half Mexican, so I have a unique experience facing bigots. I have faced bigotry from both white people that hated me because of the color of my skin and from minorities when I acted too "white". Bigotry as defined by Merriam-Webster is "person who is obstinately or intolerantly devoted to his or her own opinions and prejudices; especially : one who regards or treats the members of a group (as a racial or ethnic group) with hatred and intolerance". Any race, gender, or religion can be a bigot. All you have to do is hate someone because they belong to a particular group.
So how can Hillary be a bigot? Does she hate minorities or other groups? She does, and I'll give you example from how progressives treat minorities. Progressives do not view minorities as individuals, but part of an entire ethnic group. Thus, they can say everyone within that group is a victim of the "oppressors" from which progressives can save them! If an individual from that group states they don't want to be saved and express opinions different than progressives they are immediately vilified/hated. Progressives are so devoted to the "progressive" opinions and that they actively hate any minorities that won't act as victims. They judge them purely on their skin color of what they are capable of doing. This is being "obstinately or intolerantly devoted to his or her own opinions and prejudices".
So the next time someone laughs/scoffs at Hillary Clinton being called a "bigot", just know they have their own bigotry they are hiding behind their progressive ideals
